title: SMP Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 08 Assistant Manager, Senior Assistant Secretary and Other Posts
description: The Syama Prasad Mookerjee Port has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 08 Assistant Manager, Senior Assistant Secretary, and Deputy Manager  Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics Engineering, and Post-graduation can apply for the SMP Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can...
